name: Drop Point - Polished Black - Black Iridium Lens Sunglasses

features: Medium high wrap rectangular lens shape with optimized peripheral vision and side protection.
Unobtainium® nosepads increase grip with perspiration for a no slip grip.
Three-Point Fit holds lenses in precise optical alignment while eliminating pressure points.
Protective sports-specific Oakley Soft Vault included.
Available in Asia Fit and with Oakley Prizm™ Sport & Oakley Authentic Prescription Lenses.
Plutonite® Lenses offer top UV Protection filtering 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm.
O Matter™ stress-resistant frame material is both lightweight and durable for all-day comfort and protection.
